//notes: ejection port door length of M4A1 (3.1 in.) used as reference length for area calculation

name.str: BA Atlas S-One 10.5″ .300 Blackout AR-15 upper receiver

variants.description: A complete upper receiver assembly for AR-15-style firearms.  Includes a 10.5-inch barrel chambered in .300 Blackout, standard-issue internal components, and an M-LOK handguard with most of its upper rail between the start and the end of the handguard missing.  <variant:black>

notes: trim is for the part where the barrel sticks ahead of the handguard, including the area of the flash hider

//add_mod: no slot for bayonet lug because the barrel is not long enough to hold a bayonet

//notes: handguard length (6.5 in.) used as reference length for area calculation

variants.description: A complete upper receiver assembly for AR-15-style firearms.  Includes a 7.5-inch barrel chambered in .300 Blackout, standard-issue internal components, and an M-LOK handguard with most of its upper rail between the start and the end of the handguard missing.  <variant:black>

notes: trim is only for the part where the barrel sticks ahead of the handguard

//add_mod: no slot for bayonet lug because the barrel is not long enough to hold a bayonet

//notes: handguard length (15 in.) used as reference length for area calculation

variants.description: A complete upper receiver assembly for AR-15-style firearms.  Includes a 16-inch barrel chambered in .300 Blackout, standard-issue internal components, and an M-LOK handguard with most of its upper rail between the start and the end of the handguard missing.  <variant:black>

notes: trim is only for the minuscule part where the barrel sticks ahead of the handguard

//add_mod: no slot for bayonet lug because the handguard leaves no space to attach a bayonet
